page.title: 14A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: My day commences at 9,cleaning the surgery.First patient at 10,then one every 15mins until 5-30. For a dental inspection I chart their dental records,then a National Health form is signed by the patient which is sent to Eastbourne so that the dentist can be paid.Some patients are nervous, I chat and put them at their ease. When a filling is needed I hand the dentist instruments,mix lining of zinc oxide and oil of cloves,prepare filling mixing silver with mercury to make amalgam which I hand to the dentist in an amalgam gun.After each patient I put clean mouthwash, sterilise the instruments. When crowns and dentures are needed I mix all impressions,take wax bites,and consult patients as to shade of teeth. All work to be sent to labs I write job cards and take to the Post Office.
